en.title: Full-Stack Engineer at **KINIT (PVT) Ltd**
en.text: Currently leading the full-stack development of Snapwerks, a scalable and high-performance platform. Responsible for designing and implementing robust backend architectures, optimizing system performance, and introducing engineering best practices. Actively mentoring junior developers while fostering innovation and delivering impactful solutions in a dynamic, fast-paced environment.

en.title: Started my own **Machine Learning Projects**!
en.text: Developed and deployed a Machine Learning project utilizing advanced algorithms and models to solve real-world problems. The project involved data preprocessing, feature engineering, model training, and evaluation, delivering accurate predictions and insights to drive decision-making.

en.title: Launched my **personal website**!
en.text: Created a personal website to showcase my projects, share my journey in programming, and provide resources for fellow developers.

en.title: Building SnapWerks across **9+ countries**
en.text: Spearheading backend and mobile development of SnapWerks â€“ a multilingual, modular job & service marketplace. Live in Sri Lanka, Netherlands, GCC, and more, with regional payment gateways and AI-driven matching integrated.

en.title: Modern POS for **Fareed Motors**
en.text: Developing a modern point-of-sale system for a leading vehicle dealership. Features include inventory, billing, dynamic reports, and secure multi-user access. Tailored for performance and usability.

en.title: Over **700+ GitHub Contributions** per year
en.text: Maintaining a high level of open-source activity, consistently contributing across diverse projects including AI tools, full-stack systems, and developer utilities.
